item.title: Thursday Briefing: Israel Strikes Damascus
item.description: Plus, the many takes on Superman.

item.title: Israel Strikes Syria’s Capital, Sending Warning to Government
item.description: Israel threatened to escalate attacks on Syrian government forces unless they withdrew from Sweida, a southern province dominated by the country’s Dru...

item.title: London’s Kew Gardens Will Renovate Iconic Glasshouses
item.description: The Palm House and the Waterlily House, two hulking greenhouses built in the Victorian Era, will close in 2027 for four years of major renovations.

item.title: Syria Agrees to Cease-Fire in Sweida After Israeli Attack on Damascus
item.description: Israel launched deadly airstrikes on Syria’s capital on Wednesday, and threatened to escalate unless Syrian government forces withdrew from Sweida, a ...

item.title: Carney Moves to Reduce Canada’s Chinese Steel Imports in Response to Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: Canada’s steel industry fears that Chinese steel facing steep tariffs in the United States will be sent north and overwhelm the Canadian market.
